about_the_game:
Enter the world of electromobility and manage your own electric vehicle charging station!
During the gameplay of EV Station you have the opportunity to take on the role of an owner of an electric vehicle charging station. Your tasks are varied and challenging-from basic customer service to doing minor repairs in the workshop. This is no ordinary station - here every day brings new challenges, and you are responsible for the efficient operation of the entire business!



Save and generate your own energy! Your station can be powered by renewable energy sources. Install solar modules to reduce the cost of running your station, and store excess energy in special energy storage facilities. When your business develops well enough, you can invest in better, but also other energy sources that will provide extra power. These solutions will make your station more self-sufficient and environmentally friendly!



Running a station is also technically challenging. Sometimes chargers can break down, photovoltaic panels need regular cleaning-these are just some of the problems you have to solve. The better you take care of the technical condition of your station, the better your business functions.



Station development is the key to success. Replace old solar panels with new, more efficient models to maximize energy production. Add a workshop to your station to perform more advanced vehicle repairs. Invest in new technologies, increase the number of charging stations, optimize energy costs. Every investment and development is a step toward building a powerful charging center.



Are you ready to become a leader in the electromobility industry? Your success depends on your management skills, quick decisions and keen eye for detail. Take up the challenge and see if you can create the most modern charging station!
Features:
- Customer service, electric vehicle charging, battery replacement station
- Minor vehicle repairs
- Modernization, expansion and development of stations
- Investment in renewable energy sources and energy consumption management
- Taking care of the technical condition of the station infrastructure
- Technical and logistical challenges

  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
